attributes.action: publish in a simple format, the costs of administering common taxes as a percentage of revenues raised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have become used to being taxed through many different means, but rarely are we told what percentage of the revenues raised simply go in administering the tax. By declaring the percentages for the different tax streams we can assess those areas that simply waste money on administration versus those that provide constructive revenues.
